representation_information.name: PDF (Portable Document Format), version 1.7, ExtensionLevel 3
representation_information.description: Extension to ISO 32000-1:2008, published by Adobe Systems Incorporated in June 2008 in association with release of Acrobat 9.0. A general document representation language. PDF represents formatted, page-oriented documents. This version introduces new functionality to support CAD/CAM and GIS communities.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
